StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: CreateAccount_SP
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
create or replace PROCEDURE CreateAccount_SP
(
USERNAME_IN IN VARCHAR2,
PASSWORD_IN IN VARCHAR2,
RESULT OUT NUMBER
)
AS
ValidUN Accounts.USERNAME%TYPE;
AccID Accounts.ID%TYPE;
Type_ID Accounttypes.ID%TYPE;

ACCOUNT_EXISTS Exception;

BEGIN

SELECT COUNT(Accounts.UserName) INTO ValidUN FROM Accounts
WHERE UserName = USERNAME_IN;

IF ValidUN != 0 THEN
--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('If is true');
RAISE ACCOUNT_EXISTS;
END IF;

--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(validUN);
SELECT ID INTO Type_ID FROM AccountTypes WHERE TypeName = 'USER';
INSERT INTO Accounts (Username, PWord, Accounttypes_Id) VALUES(USERNAME_IN, PASSWORD_IN, Type_ID);
COMMIT;
SELECT Accounts.ID INTO AccID FROM Accounts
WHERE UserName = USERNAME_IN;
INSERT INTO LockEvents (Accounts_ID) VALUES(AccID);
RESULT := 1;

Exception
WHEN ACCOUNT_EXISTS THEN
RESULT := 2;
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
RESULT := 2;
WHEN OTHERS THEN
RESULT := 4;
NULL;
END CREATEACCOUNT_SP;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
create or replace PROCEDURE CreateAccount_SP
(
USERNAME_IN IN VARCHAR2,
PASSWORD_IN IN VARCHAR2,
RESULT OUT NUMBER
)
AS
ValidUN Accounts.USERNAME%TYPE;
AccID Accounts.ID%TYPE;
Type_ID Accounttypes.ID%TYPE;

ACCOUNT_EXISTS Exception;

BEGIN

SELECT COUNT(Accounts.UserName) INTO ValidUN FROM Accounts
WHERE UserName = USERNAME_IN;

IF ValidUN != 0 THEN
--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('If is true');
RAISE ACCOUNT_EXISTS;
END IF;

--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(validUN);
SELECT ID INTO Type_ID FROM AccountTypes WHERE TypeName = 'USER';
INSERT INTO Accounts (Username, PWord, Accounttypes_Id) VALUES(USERNAME_IN, PASSWORD_IN, Type_ID);
COMMIT;
SELECT Accounts.ID INTO AccID FROM Accounts
WHERE UserName = USERNAME_IN;
INSERT INTO LockEvents (Accounts_ID) VALUES(AccID);
RESULT := 1;

Exception
WHEN ACCOUNT_EXISTS THEN
RESULT := 2;
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
RESULT := 2;
WHEN OTHERS THEN
RESULT := 4;
NULL;
END CREATEACCOUNT_SP;
